name: Blind and Schizophrenic
description:
Sixty-nine year old Richard Cox is a washed up schizophrenic, who also happens to be blind on account of his constant absinthe consumption. Worse still, fate forces him to prolong his pitiful existence in spite of his handicaps. The only thing left to chance now is how he will spend the little time he has left......

- Explore the dark streets of your hometown using primarily sound and your schizophrenia

- Survive as many days as you can without dying or going insane

- See how much respect you can accumulate by completing quests for the denizens of the town, or by indulging in your own vices

- Smoke weed, collect welfare, or just shoot up the town, it's your sandbox!


What would you do if you were blind and schizophrenic?
